sources.title: The Ballerina | Full Movie | Action Revenge
sources.description:
The Ballerina - A young girl must watch as her parents are killed during a mob family's struggle for power. She swears to kill those responsible for her parent's death, but little does she know that her brother is the one ultimately responsible. Taking place shortly after "Shadow Rises", the dragon finds his way into the middle of this family feud.
2008.  Stars: Kirk Lansdon, Matthew Jasso, Melissa Harrod

metadata.Plot: A man and his 9-year-old daughter disappear into the swampy Virginia backwoods. Haunted by tragedy and destitution, they must both face the painful past if they are to ever have a future.
metadata.Actors: Isabella Pullen, Steve Pullen, Peggy Kiefer Pullen
